description:
Tiger bends the rules to try to catch a violent NEXT named Vincent Carl, who left Barnaby badly injured while evading capture.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Ame ga Ori Hajimete kara Raincoat o Tsukuraseru na
Have Not Thy Cloak to Make When It Begins to Rain.
Have not thy cloak to make when it begins to rain. 雨が降り始めてからレインコートを作らせるな
